title: Question:
author: BitcoinKillerTok
content: Starting today my journey in bitcoin I want to know many things from bitcoin and I am I can learn a lot from big people and if I am here I can check what is good and what is bad also easily I know it is known as one of the best currency in the world.I'm new here and see a lot of people compare gambling games to bitcoin it's never possible bitcoin is the best everyone has to agree.

comments.author: dzungmobile
comments.body: If you are newbie, you must read[General] Bitcoin Wallets - Which, what, why?Bitcoin information and resourcesRecommended walletsChoose your Bitcoin walletSecurity checklistThe bullish case for BitcoinMastering Bitcoin.But if you are not newbie, ignore my recommendation.

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: The post above mine has a lot of resources that should get you started that’s if you really take your time to go through them, but if you want to stay in this forum it’s best you learn about the rules[1] of the forum as it will help you understand how to find your ways around the forum and also the things that are frown at here.[1] https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=703657.0

comments.author: Orpichukwu
comments.body: How about adding this to the list of recommended list?  [AUGUST UPD.] Beginners & Help Encyclopedia  If you are a reader and if you are here to learn, I believe you will take a little peek at the forum rules, both official and unofficial, as it will be helpful to your journey here.Reading through, you should never joke with the part of the forum rules that talks about stealing other people's work, either for research purposes, information passing to others, etc. Always make sure you present information that belongs to you as yours and anyone that belongs to another as there. Do not try to outsmart anyone here. Just be free and read through the forum. You will learn a lot from here, as much as you want, and I believe others can also learn from your knowledge. Good luck and I hope to see you around.

comments.author: Nheer
comments.body: Quote from: BitcoinKillerTok on September 26, 2023, 08:16:49 AMStarting today my journey in bitcoin I want to know many things from bitcoin and I am I can learn Quote from: dzungmobile on September 26, 2023, 08:29:20 AMBut if you are not newbie, ignore my recommendation.From the quote above he made mention of starting his crypto journey today which means he is a newbie and obviously he would need all your recommendations to kickstart his crypto journey. We have seen a lot of newbie accounts come to forum and make a post like this and claim they are so interested in bitcoin and want to learn about it but in the end they are all empty claims and after a while we stop seeing them around so OP i hope your case would be different. Before embarking on your journey you should familiarize yourself with the rules of the forum and how things are done here if you’re interested in growing here in the forum but if you’re not you can always come to the forums and acquire the bitcoin knowledge you seek as an invisible member who never contributes to the forum. I see some members already provided some useful links already. Make sure you go through them all it will help you both inside and outside of the forum. I hope to see you grow in knowledge soon.

comments.author: bitmover
comments.body: Quote from: BitcoinKillerTok on September 26, 2023, 08:16:49 AMStarting today my journey in bitcoin I want to know many things from bitcoin and I am I can learn a lot from big people and if I am here I can check what is good and what is bad also easily I know it is known as one of the best currency in the world.In my opinion,  if you really want to learn, just go straight to this bookhttps://github.com/bitcoinbook/bitcoinbookMastering Bitcoin 2nd Edition - Programming the Open Blockchain This is the best bitcoin book around. Antonopoulos is an amazing writer and speaker. You can also take a look at his YouTube channelhttps://m.youtube.com/user/aantonop

comments.author: mvdheuvel1983
comments.body: Interesting. You are in the right community with many resources. How fast you learn is dependent on you. If your intention is to learn more about bitcoin you would need to read wide more than the knowledge shared on this platform. I want to caution you that your aim here shouldn't be to accumulate merits, neither should it be to create topics every other day advising newbies and other ranking members. The knowledge of bitcoin doesn't stop here. In fact if you use this forum correctly, you will not only accumulate bitcoins but you will become a very reputable member here. PS: The poll is not necessary.

comments.author: ImThour
comments.body: Hi bud, I see you have named yourself BitcoinKiller and you are now happily starting your journey with Bitcoin as a bitcoin investor. I am sure everyone who is new to this forum, is here to learn more and If you would ask me personally how I prefer to learn, it's by going through posts in this board (Bitcoin Discussion) or by clicking the "Show unread posts since last visit." and then you look for a topic of your interest. Read some replies and understand, this will surely increase your knowledge.

comments.author: Sayeds56
comments.body: Quote from: BitcoinKillerTok on September 26, 2023, 08:16:49 AMStarting today my journey in bitcoin I want to know many things from bitcoin and I am I can learn a lot from big people and if I am here I can check what is good and what is bad also easily I know it is known as one of the best currency in the world.I'm new here and see a lot of people compare gambling games to bitcoin it's never possible bitcoin is the best everyone has to agree. Starting your journey in Bitcoin is an exciting step into the world of cryptocurrencies and blockchains technology. It is important to have right perspective and understanding as you begin. Bitcoin is a valuable addition to our investment portfolio, but it is not without risks. Approach it with a well informed and balanced perspective.Some members have already shared here useful links that will undoubtedly enrich your knowledge of Bitcoin and help you to make right investment decisions. Addtio0nally participate in discussions on this forum to get up-to-date market information/insights and new development in crypto space.

comments.author: SquirrelJulietGarden
comments.body: Quote from: bitmover on September 26, 2023, 09:57:37 AMhttps://github.com/bitcoinbook/bitcoinbookMastering Bitcoin 2nd Edition - Programming the Open Blockchain Antonopoulos has two other books about Bitcoin.The Internet of MoneyMastering the Lightning Network (LN)QuoteThis is the best bitcoin book around. Antonopoulos is an amazing writer and speaker. You can also take a look at his YouTube channelhttps://m.youtube.com/user/aantonopAt Antonopoulos' Youtube channel, we can use his playlist to filter his videos.Bitcoin for Beginners is one of his playlists and it is a good resource to start.Awesome Bitcoin is another good one https://github.com/igorbarinov/awesome-bitcoinFrom Bitcoin Developer List, we can explore their Bitcoin developments with many helpful websites and tools, open source code on Github.

comments.author: livingfree
comments.body: Quote from: BitcoinKillerTok on September 26, 2023, 08:16:49 AMStarting today my journey in bitcoin I want to know many things from bitcoin and I am I can learn a lot from big people and if I am here I can check what is good and what is bad also easily I know it is known as one of the best currency in the world.I'm new here and see a lot of people compare gambling games to bitcoin it's never possible bitcoin is the best everyone has to agree. Welcome to the forum, it's best that you have posted this first to Beginners and Help so kindly move the thread there. We're gonna be part of your journey so keep reading all the links given to you because they're all going to be helpful to you as you start.Aside from the links given to you already, you can explore in exchanges that provides details about Bitcoin for starters. Just like Binance, they have their academy.https://academy.binance.com/en/articles/what-is-bitcoin

comments.author: apogio
comments.body: Quote from: bitmover on September 26, 2023, 09:57:37 AMIn my opinion,  if you really want to learn, just go straight to this bookhttps://github.com/bitcoinbook/bitcoinbookMastering Bitcoin 2nd Edition - Programming the Open Blockchain This is the best bitcoin book around. Antonopoulos is an amazing writer and speaker. You can also take a look at his YouTube channelhttps://m.youtube.com/user/aantonopQuote from: SquirrelJulietGarden on September 26, 2023, 10:33:56 AMMastering Bitcoin 2nd Edition - Programming the Open Blockchain At Antonopoulos' Youtube channel, we can use his playlist to filter his videos.Bitcoin for Beginners is one of his playlists and it is a good resource to start.Awesome Bitcoin is another good one https://github.com/igorbarinov/awesome-bitcoinFrom Bitcoin Developer List, we can explore their Bitcoin developments with many helpful websites and tools, open source code on Github.I liked "Mastering Bitcoin" so much that I ordered it in physical copy. It's an incredible book. Good recommendations guys.To the OP, I need to give a more general advice since all the posts above are more specific. Bitcoin is a complex subject, as it combines Mathematics, Cryptography, Finance, Computer Science etc. Therefore, you need to remember 2 things:1. baby steps. Learn little by little and avoid sprinting. Just find a pace that suits you and try to learn in-depth.2. beware of bad advices. In general, if something looks suspicious to you, make sure to avoid it, or ask here. Never share ANY info if you are not sure. If you are anxious about something, take deep breaths and ask here.

comments.author: peter0425
comments.body: Quote from: BitcoinKillerTok on September 26, 2023, 08:16:49 AMStarting today my journey in bitcoin I want to know many things from bitcoin and I am I can learn a lot from big people and if I am here I can check what is good and what is bad also easily I know it is known as one of the best currency in the world.good start that you shared your journey here mate because we need more supporters from outside the forum and people like you.try to extend your patience and trust.QuoteI'm new here and see a lot of people compare gambling games to bitcoin it's never possible bitcoin is the best everyone has to agree. you are just knew , but you are hating those people who compares gambling to bitcoin ? wqhen you invest in something like waiting , there is a small part of gamble so try to learn it first and not just jumping to your conclusion as newbie.

comments.author: Sim_card
comments.body: Welcome to the forum mate, you have been provide with a lot of materials that will help you grow and last here in the forum. My advise is that you should read them and do your own research with google. You can also use the search engine to look for topics of your interest, feel free to navigate round the forum to see boards of your interest. Let me also give you a thread by Ratimov to read Beginners &Help Encyclopedia

comments.author: arabspaceship123
comments.body: If you're interested in bitcoin you should read the boards. You're already aware you don't need us to tell you. The forum's a library of history so you're in the right place. It's going to be a good education if you're really interested to learn. I didn't see newbies adding polls for their first post. It isn't common so if you haven't been here before with a different user you're a fast learner.Quote from: BitcoinKillerTok on September 26, 2023, 08:16:49 AMStarting today my journey in bitcoin I want to know many things from bitcoin and I am I can learn a lot from big people and if I am here I can check what is good and what is bad also easily I know it is known as one of the best currency in the world.I'm new here and see a lot of people compare gambling games to bitcoin it's never possible bitcoin is the best everyone has to agree.

comments.author: Mayor of ogba
comments.body: Welcome to the Bitcointalk forum, I think anywhere you find yourself you should know the rules and regulations of that place. So, learn the rules and regulations of the Bitcointalk forum so that it will enable you to know how things are being done here. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1689727.0The link above is the things a newbie should know before posting on this forum. You can learn great things about Bitcoin on this forum if you are willing to do so, you can also do your research about Bitcoin in other places too.This link will lead to Bitcoin-related books https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5350541.0

comments.author: Franctoshi
comments.body: Op, feel free to be part of the great community of Bitcoiners, all you need to succeed here or start with your tour is to learn, learn, and experience it.  Also, I suggest you go try reading the Bitcoin white paper that launched the system if you haven't, And I guarantee you will have more reasons to stick with Bitcoin and the intelligentsia ideology of Satoshi. Ensure you adhere to the rules and never go against the rules that entitle you to be a member such as perpetrating plagiarism and spamming the platform,  with that being said you are at peace with the community.

comments.author: Doan9269
comments.body: Quote from: BitcoinKillerTok on September 26, 2023, 08:16:49 AMStarting today my journey in bitcoin I want to know many things from bitcoin and I am I can learn a lot from big people and if I am here I can check what is good and what is bad also easily I know it is known as one of the best currency in the world.I have a little advise to give you, try as much as possible to ensure that you read through all the links given to you and make sure you're active on the forum, since your intentions is on learning then tou must endeavor to create an atmosphere for that, then you also gave to take up some responsibilities in learning by yourself because not everything you will be told of eventually, you can will have to make discovery of some by yourself.Quote from: BitcoinKillerTok on September 26, 2023, 08:16:49 AMI'm new here and see a lot of people compare gambling games to bitcoin it's never possible bitcoin is the best everyone has to agree. Sometimes, we don't have to work on what people say, we need to make our own findings to have to certainty in that, don't also trust every news source without verifying their information first, everyone will talk their own but not all that is being said are true or correct.

comments.author: sokani
comments.body: Quote from: BitcoinKillerTok on September 26, 2023, 08:16:49 AMStarting today my journey in bitcoin I want to know many things from bitcoin and I am I can learn a lot from big people and if I am here I can check what is good and what is bad also easily I know it is known as one of the best currency in the world.I'm new here and see a lot of people compare gambling games to bitcoin it's never possible bitcoin is the best everyone has to agree. Welcome to the forum. I can see that you've been supplied with many links to help you in your crypto sojourn. Do well to go through them and digest every piece of information therein. The forum is a very rich crypto platform where you get to interact with the best minds in the crypto space and also get to learn everything about cryptocurrency, blockchain, wallet security, privacy and many more. So maximize the opportunity here and whenever you want to create a new topic, always use the search option to check first if there's an existing topic to avoid making a duplicate.

comments.author: Broadanbig
comments.body: It is nice having you here OP. I see your enthusiasm and curiosities in learning about Bitcoin. Feel free to check around the boards to see for yourself all you need to know about Bitcoin and this platform. There are lots of educative posts and articles which you could read and have knowledge about Bitcoin as I see some links have already been dropped here for your consumption. You can just go through them and see what you will have to know in other to gain more knowledge and insight about Bitcoin. You can as well identify with your local board so you could easily relate with people there if you find it difficult communicating here. The local boards were created so that everyone member here could enteract freely in their native language with their locals for better understanding. Local board helps newbie to get acquainted with the platform when they enteract and ask questions to their locals who are far ahead of them in the  industry. With this, they would be able to scale through it in  learning with ease.
